items.titolo: Grok Is Generating Sexual Content Far More Graphic Than What's on X
items.descrizione: A WIRED review of outputs hosted on Grok’s official website shows it’s being used to create violent sexual images and videos, as well as content that includes apparent minors.

items.titolo: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang explains why SRAM isn't here to eat HBM's lunch — high bandwidth memory offers more flexibility in AI deployments across a range of workloads

items.titolo: Nvidia's next-gen RTX 60 series might not debut until the second half of 2027, says leaker — rumor claims Rubin architecture will power future consumer GPUs
